pageContext.title: DC-Jam signs The Ragged Jubilee
pageContext.content:
We are really happy to announce the signing of The Ragged Jubilee to DC-Jam Records. 


Based in San Luis Obispo, the band has had their music prominently featured on multiple episodes of Netflix’s Ozark, as well as the television shows, Supergirl, Walker, Shameless, The Good Lord Bird, and 68 Whiskey, and in recent blockbuster movies including Father Stu, and Buddy Games.


Their newest album, ‘Mulholland Overdrive’, with LA Based producer/musician Rob Campenella is set to be released soon with a supporting tour to follow.
